mufon ufo sighting field investigator report by mufon va fi\sip: the witness was standing on his mother���s front porch with his son and daughter when his son drew his attention to an object in the daytime sky. the witness first thought he was looking at the full moon when he first glanced at the object, as that is how large the object was in the sky. the witness saw a very large, round sphere that was extremely bright orange in color, like the shade of an orange fruit. the object was completely and evenly round. the sphere was glowing with the color orange evenly over the surface of the object. the sphere also had an aura extending outward evenly around the orb of a dimmer color orange that looked to be about one-sixth of the diameter of the object. the witness also compared the color of the sphere to that of a harvest moon. the approximate size of the sphere was that of an aspirin when held at arms length. it was about 45 degrees above the horizon and very high in the sky, being at about the same altitude as a jet would travel that would leave contrails. the object was moving in a straight line, slower than a plane travels. the sphere crossed approximately 110 degrees of the sky in its flight path after the witness first noticed the object. the object left no trail when crossing the sky and also made no sound whatsoever. the witness observed it until it disappeared into the suburban tree line. the witness stated that later a plane came overhead and had no reflection from the sun on it, so this verified that the object was indeed glowing with its own luminescence.
Summary: A very large, bright glowing orange sphere, perfectly round, traveling very slowly, with an aura of dimmer orange around the outside of the sphere.
